title: Rellekka mine

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Rellekka mining site is located in north-east Rellekka. The mine contains four clay rocks, three silver rocks, and seven coal rocks. Players who need to bank their ores may walk to the marketplace and ask Peer the Seer to bank their ores, provided they have completed the Easy Fremennik Diaries. Alternatively, players may walk west to the dock and take one of the boats to either Neitiznot or Jatizso (provided that the quest, The Fremennik Isles has been started) and bank there. If none of these options are available, players can walk to Keldagrim and deposit their ores in the bank in the north-east part of the city.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Rellekka mine
Rellekka mine
Released2 November 2004 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationNorth-east corner of Rellekka
Map
Advanced data
Typemine

The Rellekka mining site is located in north-east Rellekka. The mine contains four clay rocks, three silver rocks, and seven coal rocks. Players who need to bank their ores may walk to the marketplace and ask Peer the Seer to bank their ores, provided they have completed the Easy Fremennik Diaries. Alternatively, players may walk west to the dock and take one of the boats to either Neitiznot or Jatizso (provided that the quest, The Fremennik Isles has been started) and bank there. If none of these options are available, players can walk to Keldagrim and deposit their ores in the bank in the north-east part of the city.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 April 2021
(update)

A stile has been added to the Rellekka mine, allowing multiple people to enter and exit at the same time following completion of the Fremennik Trials.
